problem.title: Factorial Trailing Zeroes
problem.description: Given an integer n, return the number of trailing zeroes in n!. Note that n! = n * (n - 1) * (n - 2) * ... * 3 * 2 * 1.

solutions.title: Solution 1 â€“ Count Factors of 5
solutions.description: Count the number of factors of 5 in the factorial.
